mean_cn: adj. 小人国的，气量小的；  n. 侏儒，小人国居民
mean_en: tiny; relating to or characteristic of the imaginary country of Lilliput
word_etyma: lilliput《格列佛游记》中的矮人国+ian人 →矮子
short_phrase: a lilliputian world where things are small
sentence: The lilliputian man talks to his caterpillar friend.
sentence_trans: 这个小人国居民和他的毛毛虫朋友说话。
